bug_description: When the departure and destination are set to the same city, tapping Search shows an error page ('Sorry, there was an error') instead of handling the case properly.
action: Open the booking/search screen, set both From and To to the same location (e.g., San Jose, CA), then tap 'Search'.
expected_state: The app should prevent the search and show a clear validation message (e.g., 'From and To cannot be the same') or handle the search without displaying a generic error page.
